title: Tom Petty & The Heartbreakers - Anthology (2CD)(2000)[FLAC]
description:
Short: 

Anthology - Through the Years is a double compilation album featuring the best of Tom Petty and the Heartbreakers. Enjoy..

***

Disc one

    "Breakdown" (from Tom Petty and the Heartbreakers, 1976)
    "American Girl" (from Tom Petty and the Heartbreakers)
    "Hometown Blues" (from Tom Petty and the Heartbreakers)
    "The Wild One, Forever" (from Tom Petty and the Heartbreakers)
    "I Need to Know" (from You're Gonna Get It!, 1978)
    "Listen to Her Heart" (from You're Gonna Get It!)
    "Too Much Ain't Enough" (from You're Gonna Get It!)
    "Refugee" (Petty, Mike Campbell) (from Damn the Torpedoes, 1979)
    "Here Comes My Girl" (Petty, Campbell) (from Damn the Torpedoes)
    "Don't Do Me Like That" (from Damn the Torpedoes)
    "Even the Losers" (from Damn the Torpedoes)
    "The Waiting" (from Hard Promises, 1981)
    "A Woman in Love (It's Not Me)" (Petty, Campbell) (from Hard Promises)
    "Stop Draggin' My Heart Around" (with Stevie Nicks) (Petty, Campbell) (from Nicks' album Bella Donna, 1981)
    "You Got Lucky" (Petty, Campbell) (from Long After Dark, 1982)
    "Straight into Darkness" (from Long After Dark)
    "Change of Heart" (from Long After Dark)

Disc two

    "Rebels" (from Southern Accents, 1985)
    "Don't Come Around Here No More" (Petty, David A. Stewart) (from Southern Accents)
    "The Best of Everything" (from Southern Accents)
    "So You Want to Be a Rock 'n' Roll Star" (Roger McGuinn, Chris Hillman) (from Pack Up the Plantation: Live!, 1985)
    "Jammin' Me" (Petty, Campbell, Bob Dylan) (from Let Me Up (I've Had Enough), 1987)
    "It'll All Work Out" (from Let Me Up (I've Had Enough)
    "Love Is a Long Road" (Petty, Campbell) (from Full Moon Fever, 1989)
    "Free Fallin'" (Petty, Jeff Lynne) (from Full Moon Fever)
    "Yer So Bad" (Petty, Lynne) (from Full Moon Fever)
    "I Won't Back Down" (Petty, Lynne) (from Full Moon Fever)
    "Runnin' Down a Dream" (Petty, Campbell, Lynne) (from Full Moon Fever)
    "Learning to Fly" (Petty, Lynne) (from Into the Great Wide Open, 1991)
    "Into the Great Wide Open" (Petty, Lynne) (from Into the Great Wide Open)
    "Two Gunslingers" (from Into the Great Wide Open)
    "Mary Jane's Last Dance" (from Greatest Hits, 1993)
    "Waiting for Tonight" (from Playback, 1995)
    "Surrender" (new song, 2000)

***
